_note: F2 Truth floor extension: Post-generation fact-check for fabricated URLs, sources, and citations.
description: Rules for detecting and blocking fabricated URLs, fake citations, and hallucinated sources in LLM responses.

url_validation.failure_response: I cannot verify the sources I was about to cite. Let me provide information I can confirm.
url_validation.notes: Prevents SEALing responses with hallucinated links (e.g., fake PDRM Facebook posts).

citation_validation.notes: Academic citations require higher truth threshold. If unverifiable, downgrade to PARTIAL.

fact_claim_validation.description: Detect confident claims about verifiable facts
fact_claim_validation.notes: Claims about deaths, arrests, or official statements require external verification.
